original_text: You should eat them in the same way that you eat deer. People who are unclean may eat them, as well as people who are clean.
korean_text: 정한 자나 부정한 자를 막론하고 노루나 사슴을 먹는 것 같이 먹을 수 있거니와

sentences.original_text: You should eat them in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것들을 같은 방식으로 먹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: People who are unclean may eat them
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 사람들도 그것들을 먹을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: as well as people who are clean
